name: SimpleTexting
overview:
SimpleTexting provides Text Message Marketing and SMS Solutions. The company combines their intuitive web-based application with a superior commitment to client support.

SimpleTexting works with organizations in every industry to deliver targeted text messages to consumers who have opted in and are ready to respond. Using the SimpleTexting application, companies are able to distribute text coupons, send appointment reminders, hold text-to-win sweepstakes, and more, all for a nominal monthly fee.

Founded in 2010 by a team of digital marketing executives, the New York-based company boasts an involved clientele of progressive marketers from a wide range of industries. They have created the ultimate text marketing resource – the Mobile University – hosted on SimpleTexting.com. Through Mobile University, clients and text message marketers have access to a toolbox of best practices, industry-specific strategies, success stories, and simple steps to run effective text campaigns.
